member.name: M:iBankDomain.Exceptions.EFExceptionHandling.HandleEntityCommandExecutionException(System.Data.Entity.Core.EntityCommandExecutionException)
member.summary: Throws RecoverableSqlException if it is a deadlock or timeout exception. Otherwise throws UnrecoverableSqlException.

member.name: M:iBankDomain.Exceptions.EFExceptionHandling.HandleDbUpdateException(System.Data.Entity.Infrastructure.DbUpdateException)
member.summary: Throws RecoverableSqlException if it is a deadlock or timeout exception. Otherwise throws UnrecoverableSqlException.

member.name: M:iBankDomain.Exceptions.EFExceptionHandling.HandleDbEntityValidationException(System.Data.Entity.Validation.DbEntityValidationException)
member.summary: Parses validation errors and then throws custom UnrecoverableSqlException
